trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports read operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the stream supports read operations; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seek operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: false in all cases.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports write operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the stream supports write operations; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the size, in bytes, of the inbound buffer for a pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An integer value that represents the inbound buffer size, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is unreadable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is waiting to connect.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether there is more data in the message returned from the most recent read operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if there are no more characters to read in the message; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the length of a stream, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

0 in all cases.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$0 xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Always thrown.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the size, in bytes, of the outbound buffer for a pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The outbound buffer size, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The stream is unwriteable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is waiting to connect.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the current position of the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

0 in all cases.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$0 xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Always thrown.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The handle has not been set.

-or-

The pipe is waiting to connect with a named client.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred with a named client.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe handle has not been set.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the pipe transmission mode supported by the current pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The handle has not been set.

-or-

The pipe is waiting to connect in an anonymous client/server operation or with a named client.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Clears the buffer for the current stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe does not support write operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a block of bytes from a stream and writes the data to a specified buffer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx x xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xxx $$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ $ $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ $ 0$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The byte offset in the buffer array at which the bytes that are read will be placed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of bytes to read.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The total number of bytes that are read into buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
This might be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes is not currently available, or 0 if the end of the stream is reached.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx 0 xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: buffer is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
offset is less than 0.

-or-

count is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx 0.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx 0.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: count is greater than the number of bytes available in buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe does not support read operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is disconnected, waiting to connect, or the handle has not been set.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Any I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a byte from a pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxx xxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe does not support read operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is disconnected, waiting to connect, or the handle has not been set.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Any I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Sets the current position of the current stream to the specified value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The point, relative to origin, to begin seeking from.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$$ xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The new position in the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Sets the length of the current stream to the specified value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The new length of the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Waits for the other end of the pipe to read all sent bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe does not support write operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a block of bytes to the current stream using data from a buffer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx x xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The buffer that contains data to write to the pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of bytes to write to the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: buffer is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
offset is less than 0.

-or-

count is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx 0.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx 0.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: count is greater than the number of bytes available in buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe does not support write operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a byte to the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The byte to write to the stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is closed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe does not support write operations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is disconnected, waiting to connect, or the handle has not been set.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
